description.raw:
## Hide title bar

It's possible to hide a plugin's toolbar from the configuration file setting `<has_titlebar>` to false, for example `examples/config/hellodouble.config`:

~~~
<?xml version="1.0"?>

<plugin filename="libhello_plugin.so">
</plugin>

<plugin filename="libhello_plugin.so">
  <has_titlebar>false</has_titlebar>
</plugin>
~~~

![hastitle.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/64K5zaR/images/3234061717-hastitle.png)

## Default context menu

All plugins come with a default context menu with a close option.

![contextpub.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/64K5zaR/images/2256910751-contextpub.png)

## Custom context menu

Plugins can override the default menu, like the `custom_context_menu` example plugin shows:

![customexample.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/64K5zaR/images/524187648-customexample.png)
